column1: Little Goat Diner////I've been to Little Goat a handfull of times
column2: and it's unforuntate that I waited to have a bad experience before writing a review.  Past experiences have been hit or miss
column3: but overall the food quality was good.  My fiance and I went again last Saturday
column4: and it seemed like the "B-Team" was working.  Service was very slow
column6: and the food was a disaster.  I ordered the beef ravioli
column7: which (along with everything else) has a sparse description.  What came to the table was a goopy
column9: unfortunate looking mess of a meal.  After attempting to eat the food for a few minutes
column10: I decided to send it back and request something simpler (more standard).  Despite being painfully slow
column11: our waitress was polite and exhanged out the meals.
